attributes.action: Ebola treatment(drug) for all in Africa
attributes.additional_details:
There seems to be a  new medicine(drug) available to treat Ebola virus infection.Like one given to a British patient and two Americans.
British government stands for equality and fairness. Hence, British Government should lead the Western World in providing this "experimental" treatment (which we are ready to give to our citizens)  FREE to all infected patients in Africa, so that we can save lives not just in UK but thousands that are dying in Africa of this dreadful viral illness.
